lines.text: Where may I ask, is my coffee? I always start my day with a cup of coffee.
Okay, if you're good, I'll make you breakfast.
Cook? Like a woman! You are a woman!
Oh please, you guys are so old fashioned.
I'll have you know I'm a civilized man.
[looks at Little Bear]
Unlike some!
Where do you come from?
I come from Texas, Mr. Half-a-brain!
It's too risky.
Whiskey?
"Risky" Dangerous!
The boys back home call me boohoo Boone!"

[about whisky]
Not one more drop as long as I live!
[sees Omri and Patrick]
Ohhhhhhh, my dear sweet lord!
[beat]
I need a drink.
Are we always a great people?
You are always a great people, but it's not always so good.

[Before pulling the arrow out of Boone]
Blood will flow. Get me husks!
Good! I like danger. Do you like danger, Texas Man?

[about Boone and Little Bear]
Don't put them together. You know; "Cowboys and Indians".
Duh!
Indians?
You sure was right, Little Bear! God sure do play with men a lot!
There is no God here.

[crying]
Everybody's so big!
[Darth Vader, a T-Rex, G.I. Joe, a Cardassian, a Ferengi, and Robocop stop fighting and notice Omri]

[with gun aimed at Omri]
Halt!
Rrrahrr?

[after Omri picks him up to stop him from shooting Little Bear]
I'm tired of getting hauled around all the time! I might'a known you'd take the side of that stinkin' savage!
He smells, Omri, and he calls me a dirty savage.
Oh, I didn't call you dirty. I called you stinkin'!
